The Actress Is Currently Under 14-Day Self-Quarantine Radhika is relieved to be reunited with her family and is currently in self-quarantine for 14 days. "I am yet to hug them (parents)! Home is where your mom is. It is so calming to be back. During these times, I wanted to be around my parents," the tabloid quoted her as saying. â€¦ [Read more...] about Radhika Madan On Her Flight Journey To Delhi Amid COVID-19: It Was A Scene Out Of Apocalyptic Film
